tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE meteorological_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    rainfall FLOAT,
    hydropower_generation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Weather_Data (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  wind_speed DECIMAL,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Location (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT
);
